<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Clear the Way](/Feats.aspx?ID=2023) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 183 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Mauler](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=68)

**Prerequisites**
[Mauler Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2022)

**Requirements**
You're wielding a melee weapon in two hands.

</column>

---

You put your body behind your massive weapon and swing, shoving enemies to clear a wide path. You attempt to [Shove](/Actions.aspx?ID=38) up to five creatures adjacent to you, rolling a separate [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) check for each target. Then Stride up to half your Speed. This movement doesn't trigger reactions from any of the creatures you successfully Shoved.
name: Clear the Way
requirement: You're wielding a melee weapon in two hands.
